brainly_data.question: What is the process of discovery that allows us to link observations with actual facts? A. Science B. Inquiry C. Mathematics D. Repetition
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: What is the process of discovery that allows us to link observations with actual facts? A. Science B. Inquiry C. Mathematics D. Repetition

all_answers.text:
A. Science.

Science is the discovery of nature.
